import React from 'react' import { Outlet } from 'react-router-dom' import { ToastContainer } from 'react-toastify' import { ScaleLoader } from 'react-spinners' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' const override = { position: "absolute", top: "0", left: "0", textAlign: "center", right: "0", bottom: "0", backgroundColor: "rgb(0 0 0 / 30%)", zIndex: "9999", } const Layout = () => { const statusLoading = useSelector(state => state.globalLoading.status); return (
) } export default Layout
